response.original_title: Climax Blues Band - Live From London
response.overview: In January 1984, the iconic Marquee Club, London was the venue for a magnificent performance by the Climax Blues Band. Featuring original members Peter Haycock and the late Colin Cooper, the group played to a full house their unique blend of blues and soft-rock. US and UK Top 10 hit 'Couldn't Get It Right', 'Going To New York' and 'Blackjack And Me' were recorded for the 'Live From London' series.
response.title: Climax Blues Band - Live From London
